name: Rio Music
description: A SuperFast VC Player bot to play songs in Telegram Video Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls.

SESSION_NAME.description: Pyrogram String Session of assistant account

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get this value from @BotFather on TG

BOT_NAME.description: A name for your MusicPlayer Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from from my.telegram.org/apps

OWNER_ID.description: User id of the person who will known as owner of the bot.

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Username of the group where users will go and disturb you, without @

SUDO_USERS.description: User IDs of the users who will counted as admin everywhere (if more than one separate them by space).

START_IMG.description: Telegraph link of the pic which you want to set as the start pic of your bot

PING_IMG.description: Telegraph link of the pic which you want to set as the ping pic of your bot

PMPERMIT.description: If you want to notify users who pm to assistant account that it's the assistant account of your bot so don't spam messages there (ENABLE/DISABLE).

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max audio duration limit for downloads (minutes).
